thread.title: Great location and staff!
thread.title_full: Great location and staff! - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Herald Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: momonthego75
title: Great location and staff!
text:
Just spent a week here and really enjoyed our stay, the staff was friendly and helpful from the front desk to Stephen at the bar .The bar has indoor as well as outdoor seating in a quaint patio . The room did not have much of a view, but it was clean and quiet for New York thats a win!
The location of the hotel is perfect to get around town, you can walk, take the subway a block away or jump in one of the thousands of taxis driving by outside. Breakfast is included and usually crowded ( coffee, bagels, muffins and some fruit) if you want anything else there are countless places within walking distance to have a full breakfast.
I would stay here again, for the convinience , price and friendly staff.
Room Tip: Our room was facing the back alley no view but it was quiet so if you prefer quiet over view ask for... See more room tips
